titleStmt.title: Four sermons preached upon solemne occasions I. The troubler of Israel. II. The righteous mans concern for the churches misery. Preached before the judges. III. Cæsars due honour, preached before the mayor and aldermen of Leicester, May 29. 1669. IV. Davids work and rest, preached before the election of the mayor. By Tho. Stanhope A.M. Vicar of St. Margarets in Leicester.
titleStmt.author: Stanhope, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Brome, at the Gun, at the west end of St. Pauls,

notesStmt.note: "Preached ... judges" preceded by a left curly bracket.
Each sermon has a divisional title page.
With a final leaf of errata.

place.placeName: the Gun, at the west end of St. Pauls
